name: International official finance
description: International official financing includes the inflows and outflows related to official development assistance, other official flows, other flows from Development Finance Institutions and other long-term debt from commercial sources.
source: OECD DAC, Development Initiatives, World Bank International Debt Statistics

name: Commercial resources
description: Commercial resources includes inflows and outflows related to foreign direct investment and portfolio equity.

name: Private resource
description: Private resources includes the inflows and outflows related to remittances and private development assistance
